item.title: Scott Phillips
item.description: #cell-a6eff4d85669844957efb241db253656d8f6be92 A pioneer of transformative business models, I have a proven ability to initiate long-lasting, profitable, organisational change. This is generally achieved with thorough design, systematising niche-insight, fused with new technology. The result is long-term, reproducable value. But, I can not do this work alone. My work relies on being in an environment, determined to uncover dissatisfaction, question the norm and forge new directions. Previous sucesses include deployment of systems mitigating preventable losses, first-to-market with 64bit technology and streamlining applications by interpreting user behaviour.

item.title: RVO.LT
item.description: #cell-a1684a17724a6079de8bb16c32e3d5f632ff8a21 Beyond Sustainability The platform shares 20 years of learning about domestic and community sustainability. The aim is to connect other design sucesses with people across disciplines. Areas of focus The project aims to bring attention to key areas of change: Health, Education, Food, Transport and Shelter, for billions. Visit RVO.LT

item.title: Marzò
item.description: Communicating family values A warm, welcoming brand – clear for local people looking for fresh, organic produce. Yet appealing to food connoisseurs, even overseas. Traditional Graphic Design Devoured by hype: fresh, organic produce is mis-sold. Marzo, on the other-hand tell the real story, embracing a lo-fidelity, informal aesthetic. #cell-88ac24f1af2ad5e5096ca010ddde47dbbb247db5 Powerful, nimble pages The website is mobile-first, developed on NetlifyCMS, an interface for zero-compromise authours integrating with GitHub. A static site generator called HUGO produces flat files without a database.

item.title: Locality
item.description: #cell-ab377a2224e2164c291ce0a2eae21af00508d19e Co-habitation Property Services This webapp helps people in the luxury rental market organise and filter rooms to taste. JSON sanitisation in NetlifyCMS The filter takes JSON data and renders it client-side keeping the information up-to-date without having complicated processes likely to fail. Terse output from data templates, will catch data-entry mistakes. This investment makes maintaining the properties as simple as possible – even when tiny nuances in content are required.

item.title: Sebastian Smith Photography
item.description: #cell-7ba57112d4c767063929e514764f168cc2050424 An eye for detail Busy with photography clients such as Naomi Campbell, Kim Kardashian and Martina Navratilova, Sebastian Smith occasionally needs to retouch shoots. …and with clients like these Seb requires a keen eye for detail. Working together on these images involves repairing blemishes, performing complex repairs and preparing hairstyles for large-format advertising.

item.title: Vaultarch
item.description: #cell-138224f7580c15250886f9f1a2ed972bf7cde4e3 Award winning Ltech startup Cambridge University’s Andrew Buchanan, set out to make counterfeit, theft and fraud a thing of the past: Vaultarch is a multi award winning Ltech (Legal tech) startup protecting valuable collectables. Scott displayed energy & resourcefulness… He has good networking skills & an eye for the commercial factor – Andrew Buchanan, Vaultarch Visit Vaultarch.com Startup Weekend Startup Next Facebook Twitter Cyberport2, Hong Kong Project in detail Why is Vaultarch important?

item.title: PeR, Il Parco dell Energia Rinnovabile
item.description: #cell-b7ff3a01e60583bb23829490105c4abd34b01ff5 The largest independent, sustainability research center in Italy Deep in an area of outstanding natural beauty With limited resources, such as no water, lead by engineer and entrepreneur Alessandro Ranco a small team has built on an ancient site. Adding power, irrigation, and a teaching block on top of where they live PeR has become the largest facility of it’s kind in Italy. Project Legacy Improved Service Delivery Service improvements have increase profit from overseas, agrotourism visitors.

item.title: CRM platform
item.description: #cell-37466e8d0da7e02653b532f8ee210f73cb3532b0 Organising the organisers Who are 3Si, and what do they do? Derived from their surname Chris Sinclair, Pete Sinclair, and their Father – a silent partner, 3Si handle membership and subscription data. With 20 years of integrity their in-house CRM has evolved to become: OM.Net. Clients The OM.Net platform has been developed for Nonprofit Organisations such as Mensa, The National Farmer’s Union and Trading Standards. The web platform operates for clientele such as The Pathological Society.

item.title: Carfax Gardens at Carfax Tower
item.description: #cell-d74c420e67b483c7ca78435cef6822a304b7852d Carfax Cafe, Oxford In 2012 entrepreneur, Fernando Kindermann opened Smiley Cafe. Friendly hospitality and Brazilian and Italian dishes are served from the shadowy site – although, that formula wasn’t enough. The venue struggled to attract passing trade and consistent regulars. To help the Carfax Tower stand-out, we used design to attract people and boost sales… The Project in detail Meet here for Breakfast, Lunch & Tea The business needed a rebrand.

item.title: M+H Awards Winner
item.description: A huge achievement, against all odds The Children’s Centre for Civilisation & Creativity, Heliopolis, Egypt endured the usual construction challenges. In 2011, the timing of the Arab-spring and Egyptian revolution further complicated things for Mallinson’s Architects & Engineers’ team. Mallinson’s winning the Museum + Heritage award in 2012 because of well organised design. Together, collaborators solved problems outside Egypt so the holistic design became a reality. #cell-8078138e405e2ae26d5a47e3167206c3ec2ac605 Beyond content creation Project background Appointed to create mixed digital media, including games, touch interfaces and an animated centre-piece consisting of a double-sided, 30m LED wall.

item.title: Bowers & Wilkins
item.description: Thomas Manss Creating something remarkable Bowers & Wilkins make the worlds most advanced hi-fi products. Partnering with Apple, Jaguar and Lucasfilm, I was brought onboard by Thomas Manss, to celebrate their “true sound” in-car audio products for the Vintage at Goodwood conference. #cell-f42b10653a54a8b5f3476c7da543c0c23b377ec5 Conference opener The outline of the brief was to tell the evolutionary story of Bowers & Wilkins, under strict oversight of the talented art-director: Thomas Manss.

item.title: InstantWebapp
item.description: Background Reduce investment risk Intended for entrepreneurs to control their costs and guarantee content delivery to their customer’s devices. Component Based Design Meeting business goals, controlling costs and avoiding gotchas does not mean generic, undesirable designs. In fact, it is easier to delight the user when there are constraints are inplace that help lay the groundwork. #cell-2bfedf4d08957e4c68b25cc04c19c2e2b9e85b50 Process Discovery & Definition The goal at this stage is to create a credible wireframes to reflect the client’s demands.

item.title: Aris Technologies
item.description: #cell-1d314354a7daa9701b57b4c4a7452ed6d0952514 Software that follows the sun Aris Technologies develop online gaming platforms in niche markets. Established to follow the sun, Aris produces secure code during GMT, testing in China and constantly deployed within the USA. Project Legacy I delivered high performance assets that remain in use: earning millions of impressions, across thousands of games, delivering a solid return on investment for Aris’ most demanding private operators. The sophisticated user interface – copied by competitors, continues to underpin the every product the Development A-Team create.

item.title: Advanced Animations
item.description: #cell-05903ef56721b1598922d3f491e0634a5714cb1b An impressive heritage About Advanced Advanced Illustrations was a traditional technical drawing office, servicing Rolls Royce, Siemens, Cummins and other household names. Although their heritage did not made them immune to progress. Legacy Brought on board specifically to modernise business practices, our work together formed the foundation of a new business model – providing them a robust ROI years into the future. With a new name to reflect their offering: Advanced Animations.
